description: A selection of some of the most striking sports photographs taken around the world over the past seven days.
title: In Pictures: Sporting photos of the week
title_page: In Pictures: Sporting photos of the week - BBC Sport
maintext:
Hawaiian surfer Noah Beschen catches a wave at the Pe'ahi Jaws Surf Break on the island of Maui, Hawaii
Blanka Vas, of Hungary and Team SD Worx, competes during the 28th Zonhoven UCI Cyclo-cross World Cup 2024 in Belgium
Shang Juncheng of China serves against Luca van Assche of France during the men's singles group-stage match at the Next Gen ATP Finals in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia
LeBron James of the Los Angeles Lakers goes up for a shot against the Sacramento Kings in the first half at Golden 1 Center in Sacramento, California
Mohammed Kudus of West Ham United celebrates scoring his team's first goal with team-mate Crysencio Summerville during their Premier League match against Brighton & Hove Albion at London Stadium
A fan of Brentford holds up a scarf in the stands prior to their Premier League match against Nottingham Forest at Gtech Community Stadium
The Penn State Nittany Lions celebrate after defeating the Louisville Cardinals to win the Division I Women's Volleyball Championship, held at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville, Kentucky
Nolan Hauser of the Clemson Tigers kicks a field goal during the second quarter against the Texas Longhorns in the play-off first-round game at Darrell K Royal-Texas Memorial Stadium in Austin, Texas
Ben Jones, riding Roysse, falls at the last when 29 lengths clear at Newbury Racecourse in Newbury, England
Declan Rice of Arsenal celebrates scoring his team's fifth goal during their Premier League match against Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park
Ikura Kushida of Japan performs in a gala event during the Japanese National Figure Skating Championships at Towa Pharmaceutical Ractab Dome in Kadoma, Osaka
Tiger Woods hits out of a greenside bunker on the fourth hole during the first round of the PNC Championship at Ritz-Carlton Golf Club in Orlando, Florida
Otis tosses opponent Chad Gable across the ring during Monday Night RAW at TD Garden in Boston, Massachusetts
